name: SPAM® and Potato Soup
author: SPAM(R)
summary: A hearty, comforting soup is spiced up with a hit of SPAM® Classic or other variety and topped with Cheddar cheese.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) can SPAM® Classic or other variety, cut into cubes
½ teaspoon salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C)
Prick potatoes several times with a fork and place onto a baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until potatoes are easily pierced with a fork, 50 minutes to 1 hour
When potatoes are cool enough to handle, scoop potato flesh out into a bowl and mash lightly with a fork
Cook and stir SPAM® Classic in a skillet over medium heat until browned (optional)
Melt butter in a large pot over medium-low heat; stir in flour to form a smooth roux
Cook and stir roux until well combined and bubbling; stir in milk
Cook milk mixture, stirring continuously, until it thickens, about 5 minutes; stir in potatoes and SPAM® Classic and cook until heated through
Serve in bowls and garnish each with about 1/4 cup of Cheddar cheese
